Class WebHdfsPersistWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.hdfs.WebHdfsPersistWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class WebHdfsPersistWriter
extends Object
implements StreamsPersistWriter, Flushable, Closeable, DatumStatusCountable
    WebHdfsPersistWriter writes to hdfs.
